mapper.select: /* oracle.yp_test.grid_ore_analysis_result_list_cnt */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_ORE_ANALYSIS_RESULT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_ORE_INGREDIENT_INFO B ON A.ingredient_id = B.ingredient_id WHERE 1=1

/* oracle.yp_test.grid_ore_analysis_result_list */ SELECT A.MASTER_ID, A.INGREDIENT_ID, B.INGREDIENT_NAME, A.LOT_NO, A.DMT, A.YP, A.SELLER, A.UMPIRE, A.SETTLE, A.STATE, A.YP_ACTION, A.SELLER_ACTION FROM TBL_ORE_ANALYSIS_RESULT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_ORE_INGREDIENT_INFO B ON A.ingredient_id = B.ingredient_id WHERE 1=1
